recipients-text: Register in our service and receive a personal QR code. Provide this QR code to your customers to tip or donate you! All the client needs is to point the camera of his smartphone at your code and make 2 clicks in the window that will open. Tipping has never been easier!

payers-section-text: All you need is to point the camera of your smartphone at the QR code. Open the window with the recipient's profile, specify the amount and click pay. Tipping or donating has never been so easy and quick! Motivate and encourage service workers, favorite artists, bloggers, athletes to be better at what they do!
